associate.name: Associate
associate.description: Introductory certification for Snowflake AI Data Cloud basics

core.name: Core
core.description: Technical certification validating Snowflake implementation skills

advanced.name: Advanced
advanced.description: Role-based certifications requiring 2+ years Snowflake experience

specialty.name: Specialty
specialty.description: Deep expertise in specialized Snowflake features

SOL-C01.name: SnowPro Associate: Platform
SOL-C01.description: Entry-level certification validating essential Snowflake skills including data management, AI/ML basics, and Cortex LLM functions

domains.name: AI/ML Integration & Cortex
topics: Using Snowflake for AI data workflows

COF-C02.name: SnowPro Core Certification
COF-C02.description: Validates foundational knowledge of Snowflake's cloud data platform, architecture, and core features for implementation

domains.name: Snowflake AI Data Cloud Features & Architecture
topics: Snowflake Cloud Data Platform overview and editions (Standard, Enterprise, Business Critical)
Hybrid architecture: Storage Layer, Compute Layer, Cloud Services Layer
Virtual Warehouses: T-shirt sizing, auto-suspend, auto-resume
Metadata caching and query result caching
Snowflake editions comparison and feature availability

domains.name: Account Access and Security
topics: System-defined roles: ACCOUNTADMIN, SYSADMIN, SECURITYADMIN, USERADMIN, PUBLIC
User authentication: password, MFA, key-pair, OAuth
Data encryption at rest and in transit
Information Schema vs Account Usage views

domains.name: Performance Concepts
topics: Result cache, metadata cache, and warehouse cache
Search Optimization Service for point lookups
Spilling to local and remote storage

domains.name: Data Loading and Unloading
topics: COPY INTO command for bulk loading
File formats: CSV, JSON, Avro, Parquet, ORC, XML
PUT and GET commands for file transfer

domains.name: Data Transformations
topics: SQL functions: string, numeric, date/time, semi-structured
Stored Procedures: JavaScript, Snowpark (Python, Scala, Java)

domains.name: Data Protection and Data Sharing
topics: Time Travel: AT, BEFORE, UNDROP (1-90 days by edition)
Zero-copy cloning for databases, schemas, tables
Secure Data Sharing: shares, reader accounts

ARA-C01.name: SnowPro Advanced: Architect
ARA-C01.description: Validates expertise in designing enterprise-grade Snowflake solutions and multi-cloud architectures

exam_details.prerequisites: Active SnowPro Core Certification + 2+ years architect experience

domains.name: Accounts and Security
topics: Account parameters: account, session, object levels
RBAC hierarchy design and custom role patterns
System roles: ORGADMIN, ACCOUNTADMIN, SYSADMIN, SECURITYADMIN
Privilege management and least privilege principle
Authentication methods: SSO, MFA, OAuth, key-pair, SCIM
Network architecture: network policies, PrivateLink, VPN
Private connectivity (AWS PrivateLink, Azure Private Link, GCP Private Service Connect)

domains.name: Snowflake Architecture
topics: Data models: Data Vault, Star Schema, Snowflake Schema, OBT
Object hierarchy impact on development lifecycle

domains.name: Data Engineering
topics: Data lakehouse architecture with Iceberg tables
External tables and data lake integration
Integration with ecosystem tools (dbt, Airflow, Fivetran)

DEA-C01.name: SnowPro Advanced: Data Engineer
DEA-C01.description: Validates expertise in building, maintaining, and optimizing data pipelines in Snowflake

exam_details.prerequisites: Active SnowPro Core Certification + 2+ years data engineering experience

domains.name: Data Movement
topics: COPY INTO command: options, transformations, error handling
Snowpipe: auto-ingest, REST API, pipe management
External tables for data lake integration
File format specifications and best practices
Data ingestion patterns: batch vs streaming
Iceberg tables for open table format

domains.name: Data Transformation
topics: Stored Procedures: JavaScript, Python, Scala, Java
FLATTEN and LATERAL for nested data
Merge operations and slowly changing dimensions (SCD)

domains.name: Performance Optimization
topics: Query Profile analysis and optimization strategies

domains.name: Storage and Data Protection
topics: Zero-copy cloning for development and testing
Table types: permanent, transient, temporary, external

domains.name: Data Governance and Security
topics: Row Access Policies for row-level security
Access History and Query History views

DSA-C03.name: SnowPro Advanced: Data Scientist
DSA-C03.description: Validates expertise in applying data science and machine learning techniques using Snowflake's ML capabilities

exam_details.prerequisites: Active SnowPro Core Certification + 2+ years data science experience

domains.name: Data Science Concepts
topics: Core machine learning concepts and problem types
Model evaluation metrics and validation techniques
ML lifecycle stages: data prep, training, deployment, monitoring

domains.name: Snowflake Data Science Best Practices
topics: Snowflake Notebooks for EDA and visualization
Statistical functions: window functions, variance, stddev
Best practices for large-scale data analysis

domains.name: Model Training and Deployment
topics: Model Registry for versioning and management

ADA-C01.name: SnowPro Advanced: Administrator
ADA-C01.description: Validates expertise in administering and managing Snowflake accounts, security, and governance

exam_details.prerequisites: Active SnowPro Core Certification + 2+ years admin experience

domains.name: Security, RBAC, and User Administration
topics: Federated authentication and SSO (Identity Provider configuration)
Key pair authentication and rotation policies
Network policies and IP allow/block lists
RBAC architecture and custom role design
System roles hierarchy and privilege inheritance
SCIM integration for automated user provisioning

domains.name: Account Management and Data Governance
topics: Tri-Secret Secure and encryption key management
Row Access Policies for row-level security

domains.name: Performance Monitoring and Tuning
topics: Virtual Warehouse design and sizing strategies

DAA-C01.name: SnowPro Advanced: Data Analyst
DAA-C01.description: Validates expertise in applying advanced data analysis principles and techniques using Snowflake

exam_details.prerequisites: Active SnowPro Core Certification + 1+ years data analyst experience

domains.name: Data Preparation and Loading
topics: Data ingestion methods and best practices
Handling different file formats (JSON, Parquet, Avro, ORC)

domains.name: Built-in Functions and UDFs
topics: Working with complex data types (JSON, arrays, objects)

domains.name: Data Presentation
topics: Translating technical findings to business stakeholders

SPS-C01.name: SnowPro Specialty: Snowpark
SPS-C01.description: Validates expertise in building and deploying data solutions using the Snowpark DataFrame API

exam_details.prerequisites: Active SnowPro Core Certification + 1+ years Snowpark experience

domains.name: Snowpark Concepts and Python API
topics: Snowpark DataFrames: querying and transforming data

domains.name: Data Transformations
topics: DataFrame functions: filter, select, join, aggregate

NAS-C01.name: SnowPro Specialty: Native Apps
NAS-C01.description: Validates expertise in building, deploying, and managing Native Applications on Snowflake Marketplace

exam_details.prerequisites: Active SnowPro Core or Associate Certification + 1+ years Native Apps experience

domains.name: Design and Creation
topics: Application design patterns and best practices
Stored procedures and UDFs in apps

domains.name: Deployment and Management
topics: Cost monitoring and billing event management
Security and access controls for apps

GES-C01.name: SnowPro Specialty: Generative AI
GES-C01.description: Validates expertise in building Generative AI applications using Snowflake Cortex, including LLM functions, Cortex Search, Analyst, and Document AI

domains.name: GenAI Overview
topics: Snowflake Cortex: LLMs, Cortex Search, Fine Tuning, Cortex Agent
Security, Privacy & Access Control: RBAC, Guardrails, Required Privileges
Cortex LLM Functions & Model Allow List
Interfaces: Cortex LLM Playground, AI SQL Functions, REST API
BYOM: Snowflake Model Registry, Custom Models
Cortex Search: RAG Use Cases, Unstructured Data, REST APIs
Cortex Analyst: Semantic Model, Text-to-SQL, REST APIs

domains.name: GenAI & LLM Functions
topics: Snowflake Model Registry: Logging & Calling Models

domains.name: Document AI
topics: Roles and Privileges for Document AI
